import React, { useState } from 'react'; import ChartArea from './ChartArea'; import { useDashboard } from '../context/DashboardContext'; // Mock live trades data const liveTrades = [ { time: '13m', token: { icon: 'üëª', name: 'spam2scam' }, mc: '$892K' }, { time: '14m', token: { icon: 'üçî', name: 'fried' }, mc: '$892K' }, { time: '26m', token: { icon: 'üçî', name: 'fried' }, mc: '$782K' }, { time: '35m', token: { icon: 'üêü', name: 'HYSA' }, mc: '$202K' }, { time: '35m', token: { icon: 'üì∞', name: 'Wholesome' }, mc: '$132K' }, { time: '35m', token: { icon: 'üçî', name: 'fried' }, mc: '$814K' }, { time: '49m', token: { icon: 'üì∞', name: 'Wholesome' }, mc: '$49.2K' }, { time: '55m', token: { icon: 'üçî', name: 'fried' }, mc: '$814K' }, { time: '1h', token: { icon: 'ü•ö', name: 'Blorb' }, mc: '$86.8K' }, { time: '1h', token: { icon: 'ü•ö', name: 'Nlorb' }, mc: '$7.13K' }, { time: '1h', token: { icon: 'üì∞', name: 'Plotz' }, mc: '$70.1K' }, { time: '1h', token: { icon: 'üçî', name: 'fried' }, mc: '$953K' }, { time: '1h', token: { icon: 'üçî', name: 'fried' }, mc: '$1.05M' }, ]; export default function TradeTerminal() { const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('spot'); const [orderType, setOrderType] = useState('limit'); const [side, setSide] = useState('buy'); const { activeStrategy } = useDashboard(); // Mock data for order book const orderBook = { bids: [ { price: 45000, amount: 0.5, total: 22500 }, { price: 44950, amount: 1.2, total: 53940 }, { price: 44900, amount: 0.8, total: 35920 }, { price: 44850, amount: 1.5, total: 67275 }, { price: 44800, amount: 0.3, total: 13440 }, ], asks: [ { price: 45100, amount: 0.7, total: 31570 }, { price: 45150, amount: 1.0, total: 45150 }, { price: 45200, amount: 0.4, total: 18080 }, { price: 45250, amount: 0.9, total: 40725 }, { price: 45300, amount: 0.6, total: 27180 }, ] }; // Mock data for recent trades const recentTrades = [ { price: 45050, amount: 0.2, time: '12:45:23', side: 'buy' }, { price: 45025, amount: 0.5, time: '12:45:20', side: 'sell' }, { price: 45075, amount: 0.3, time: '12:45:18', side: 'buy' }, { price: 45000, amount: 0.8, time: '12:45:15', side: 'sell' }, { price: 45100, amount: 0.4, time: '12:45:10', side: 'buy' }, ]; return (
